API

Programmatic access to information on datasets shared on the AIDA Data Hub.

Application Programming Interfaces (API) provide standardized ways for computer programs to interact. We use APIs to make it easier for programmers to access information about the datasets that are shared on the AIDA Data Hub.

v1.0

  • metadata.json - All metadata on all datasets in JSON format.
